Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController.ChatController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatListener, LocalModelListener, StationListener, Listener, UI
public class ChatController extends GUIController implements ChatListener, LocalModelListener, StationListener
A sub-scene controller specialized in chat. It manages sending and receiving messages. Every scene that may require to use chat must have this sub-controller.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes chat sub-scene.

    • notify

      public void notify(ArrayList<Message> msg)
      This method is used to notify ChatController that a new chat message has to be displayed.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface ChatListener
      Parameters:
      msg - the ArrayList<Message> stored in chat

    • showChat

      private void showChat(ArrayList<Message> msg)
      Builds chat TextFlow pane and fill it with all chat messages. If sender has already chosen his color then message is colored with that color, other is black.
      Parameters:
      msg - the ArrayList<Message> containing all the messages to be displayed.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage()
      Notify ClientController that a new chat message has to be sent. If text is empty highlight textAreaSend. If no receivers are specified shows a Alert.

    • notify

      public void notify(LocalModelEvents type, LocalModel localModel, String... varArgs)
      This method is used to notify ChatController about LocalModel events.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface LocalModelListener
      Parameters:
      type - a LocalModelEvents representing the event type
      localModel - the LocalModel on which the event happened
      varArgs - eventual arguments

    • notify

      public void notify(PersonalStation localStationPlayer)
      This method is used to notify ChatController about PersonalStation events. Particularly, it is used to update colors of messages.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      localStationPlayer - is the PersonalStation that has changed

    • notify
